DOC.detailed_description: The investigator hypothesize high intensity interval , resistance training combine training would result similar improvement cardiometabolic health compare usual clinical care cohort sedentary overweight ( age 30-50 year old ) .
DOC.criteria: Meets least one criterion metabolic Syndrome ( IDF 2006 ) : Central obesity : waist circumference ≥90cm ( men ) ≥80cm ( woman ) ; triglyceride ≥ 150mg/dl ; HDLc < 40mg/dl ( men ) < 50 ( woman ) ; Blood pressure ≥130/85mmHg fast plasma glucose ≥ 100mg/dL . Written informed consent . Interested improve health fitness . Systemic infection . Weight loss gain > 10 % body weight past 6 month reason . Currently take medication suppresses stimulate appetite . Uncontrolled hypertension : systolic blood pressure 160 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure 95 mm Hg treatment . Gastrointestinal disease , include selfreported chronic hepatitis cirrhosis , episode alcoholic hepatitis alcoholic pancreatitis within past year , inflammatory bowel disease require treatment past year , recent significant abdominal surgery ( e.g. , gastrectomy ) . Asthma . Diagnosed diabetes ( type 1 2 ) , fast impaired glucose tolerance ( blood glucose 118 mg/dL ) , use antidiabetic medication . Currently take antidepressant , steroid , thyroid medication , unless dosage stable ( change 6 month ) . Any active use illegal illicit drug . Current exerciser ( > 30 min organize exercise per week ) . Indication unsuitability current health exercise protocol ( PARQ ) . Any condition , opinion investigator , would adversely affect conduct trial .
